text: Araby, zhivushchiye v pustyne (beduiny), yeshcho sil'neye v svoyom neverii i litsemerii, tak kak oni nakhodyatsya daleko ot znayushchikh i mudrykh lyudey i ne znayut vsekh nastavleniy Allakha, Yego poucheniy, nazidaniy i zakonov, nisposlannykh cherez Yego poslannika. Allakh znayet sostoyaniye lyudey kazhdoy iz dvukh partiy. On mudr v Svoyom vozdayanii i nakazanii
